title: Release - 'Hcltech Grant Americas Second Edition Awards $1 Million To Three Ngos To Create Scalable Solutions To Combat Climate Change' 22h - HCLTech awards $1 million to three NGOs for scalable climate change solutions in the Americas.
date: 22h - HCLTech awards $1 million to three NGOs for scalable climate change solutions in the Americas.

title: Release - 'Hcltech And Uipath Partner To Accelerate Agentic Automation For Global Enterprises' 2 Jun - HCLTech partners with UiPath to accelerate global agentic automation and establish AI Lab in India.
date: 2 Jun - HCLTech partners with UiPath to accelerate global agentic automation and establish AI Lab in India.

title: Release - 'Hcltech Among Asia'S Most Honored In Extel'S 2025 Executive Team Rankings' 30 May - HCLTech tops Extel's 2025 Asia Executive Team rankings with 17 Top 3 awards, including Best CEO and CFO.
date: 30 May - HCLTech tops Extel's 2025 Asia Executive Team rankings with 17 Top 3 awards, including Best CEO and CFO.

title: Release - 'Hcltech Recognized As A Customers' Choice In 2025 Gartner® Peer Insights™ Voice Of The Customer For Managed Network Services, Worldwide' 29 May - HCLTech named Customers' Choice in 2025 Gartner Peer Insights for Managed Network Services worldwide.
date: 29 May - HCLTech named Customers' Choice in 2025 Gartner Peer Insights for Managed Network Services worldwide.

title: Release - 'Hcltech Recognized As A Leader In Everest Group'S Custom Application Development Services PEAK Matrix® Assessment 2025' 28 May - HCLTech named Leader in Everest Group's 2025 Custom Application Development Services PEAK Matrix.
date: 28 May - HCLTech named Leader in Everest Group's 2025 Custom Application Development Services PEAK Matrix.
